welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Florencia, Cuba! Get ready to be charmed by our vibrant city known for its colorful architecture, rich history, and lively culture. We hope you have a wonderful stay and discover all that Florencia has to offer."

restaurants.name: Soda Betos
restaurants.description: Soda Betos is a diner located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pizzeria Tsunami Florencia
restaurants.description: Pizzeria Tsunami Florencia is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pizzeria Mayke Florencia
restaurants.description: Pizzeria Mayke Florencia is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Happy Pub
restaurants.description: Happy Pub is a restaurant located in Santa Clara.

restaurants.name: Pollo Frito Pupi
restaurants.description: Pollo Frito Pupi is a fried chicken joint located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maximo Gomez Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Maximo Gomez Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
